name: Heartship
description:
5th place on HaxeFlixel Game Jam!

Description:
Heartship is a fast-paced roguelite shooter game.
Use your gun for make your way by moving and slaying stuff, climb the tower and reach the wizard to find out the truth.

UPDATE #3

  • Fixed Flying Fish aim offset.
  • Wizard small graphics change.

UPDATE #2 (POST-JAM)

  • Converted .WAV files in .OGG.
  • Significantly increased push force to shielded enemies.
  • Fixed sticky bats behaviour.
  • Hold S to attract and merge the splitted parts.
  • Fixed fire-rate overflow.
  • Right mouse context menu disabled.
  • Updated the tutorial.
  • Bonus option if you complete the game on all three difficulties.

UPDATE #1

  • Shielded enemies can be knocked back.
  • Fixed spike sound reproducing after power-up taking.

Note:

If it is your first play, click the tutorial to understand the mechanics.
In the past two months I've had some intense programming sessions (due the virus).
I'll take a break for a while.
But in the meanwhile here is my entry, just in time for the jam.

I apologize in advance if a crash occurs during the game;
it rarely happens and I have not been able to identify the cause.

Thanks to PlugsAndNeedles for playing it and allowing me to adjust the difficulty based on his experience.
